summary: Reshad Logistics web application with quote request form, custom domain (www.reshalogistics.com) being configured with DNS verification
architectural_notes: Custom domain www.reshalogistics.com configured with TXT verification record
SSL certificate auto-issued after DNS verification completes
Email sending disabled (requires paid feature for quote form functionality)
known_issues: DNS TXT record for www.reshalogistics.com not yet propagated (can take up to 24 hours)
Quote form email submission fails due to email sending being disabled on account

existing_features.title: Change all instances of the phone number to 201.838.0000 in the frontend codebase, including Footer.tsx, AboutUs.tsx, and any other components displaying contact information
